rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: I would not recommend this professor at all. Harder grader than any professor I've experienced and gives out unnecessary amounts of homework, some of which that she will not discuss until after the assignment is due. The only feedback that is given is on the large assignments and essays. Would avoid at all costs.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: I think overall, she is a good teacher and she knows what she is talking about, but her class is a lot of work. I was constantly doing a discussion post, reading, or writing an essay for her class. We had homework every night and it was never just one thing to do. She will give you a lot of feedback if you ask for it which is helpful.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She is a new teacher that is still taking classes herself, so she doesn't have much time, even though she gives us a lot of work. She also follows that stereotype that new teachers are very harsh graders. Even on small busywork grades she wont hesitate to give you a C.
She's incredibly thorough, and as a currently enrolled student currently, she understands to a high degree the stresses current students face.

We had 4 essays and for each essay you had to complete a cover letter and a peer review form. The peer review form sounds easy enough, but, even if you write a glorious review, she will find something wrong with. Lots of reading and will discuss the chapter with you; if you read and can't remember something, she will think you didn't read.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: She is a VERY tough grader. She takes a ton of points of just for the simplest of mistakes. I would go through her rubric for each essay and make sure that  I did everything it said and I would still get a C on every one of my papers. She is a nice lady, but she just grades way to hard!

I hope I get to take her again. She cares about her students and what we learn. No, I wasn't a fan of the journals, but everyone in the class who complains about the workload and expectations seems to forget that we're in college. Of course we have reaings before every class and can't just get up and expected to be counted present...
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Get ready to read

comment: Definitely the worst professor KSU has ever seen. Terrible teacher, harsh grader for no reason, and she is very rude. DO NOT TAKE HER!!!

She says she doesn't believe in busy work but continues to give us daily journal entries and discussion posts that are supposed to pertain to our actual assignment. You're expected to read every night and then discuss about what you read during class. I personally would not take her again due to the amount of busy work that was given.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Some of the discussions can be annoying, but she offers a clear grading criteria. The thing I hated the most was the journals' but it's not that bad. I can tell she cares about each student, and her grading is fair.

assignments are too tedious, and the mammoth amounts of busy work is nowhere near related to class. most of the classes are her reading off things she posted on D2L and she doesn't thoroughly teach us the material that will be on quizzes. never announces quizzes until she posts about it 2 days before it. marks you absent if you leave during class
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: she gives us 2 weeks to write 5 page papers and expects us to have the paper done 1 week early, otherwise she "docks" a few points. journals and discussion posts are busy work that's completely irrelevant to what we're learning in class but she still grades on accuracy. we have pointless reading every single night. frequently uses curse words.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: If you love being treated like you are in high school take this class. You are expected to read every class. Leaving during a lecture will get you marked absent. Just take another class.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: She gives a ridiculous amount of readings and "Journals" that are so pointless and time consuming. We have had multiple readings every night. She also treats us like we are in high school. She says that the time does not dismiss us, but she does. Also she went on a ten minute rant the other day telling us how much better her 5 pm is compared to us.
